synopsis.text: Since she can't afford the uniform and sports a short haircut, Haruhi Fujioka, a talented scholarship student at the prestigious Ouran Academy, is often mistaken for a boy. One day, while searching for a quiet study spot, she stumbles upon the Third Music Room, where she encounters the Host Club - a group of charming, attractive boys who entertain the school's female students for a fee. Accidentally breaking an expensive vase, Haruhi is coerced into joining the club to repay her debt. As she navigates the world of wealthy students and learns to entertain as a host, her true identity as a girl becomes a source of amusement and intrigue for the club members and their clients.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
